# uniqueIdentifier

**Instance Property**

The unique identifier for a zone.

## Declaration

```swift
var uniqueIdentifier: UUID { get }
```

## Identifying a Zone

- **name**: The name of the zone.
- **updateName(_:completionHandler:)**: Updates the name of the zone.

items.description: Updates the name of the zone.
items.name: updateName(_:completionHandler:)
